item.description:
@justaguy wrote:

[quote=“Pure_, post:4, topic:542032”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=660906.msg4418283#msg4418283 date=1397069390]

The hardest part will be making your UI work on regular dvd players.

How so?
I’m just making a program to generate the .cfg like you see in the code I provided.
[/quote]Nevermind, I thought you was doing something useful…[/quote]

I don’t see how it isn’t. By the looks of the cfg format, it looks tedious enough to do by hand that a program would make it much easier.

item.title: File generator [WIP]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Hey guys. I have a nice program I use called DVD Flick. It’s one of the better freeware I’ve used. It is a simple dvd creator program. But it has a bit more features than just burning a .iso or .mp4 to a dvd. It will actually allow you to create a title screen, with multiple titles (Like lets say you have 12 episodes, you can have all 12 on the same dvd and a title screen to navigate). What’s cool about that, is that the templates aren’t too hard to create. It’s a few images, a font file (like ttf) and a cfg file.

However, the software is kind of old and it doesn’t seem to get any support from the general internet population. That being said, I’d like to create some form of app to that would make creating the cfg file a snap. Right now, I plan on writing this in Java or AS3. I say AS3 because I’m used to it and you have the stage to develop on. But I was thinking java because, it’s just a better language.

[code]Name = “Simple Black”;
Author = “Dennis Meuwissen”;

Description = “Only the basics, in black.”;
Copyrights = “-”;

transColor = “255,0,255”;

audioMenu
{
backgroundImage = “back.bmp”;
highlightColor = “31,127,223”;
selectColor = “0,95,191”;

Title
{
	Type = "text";
	
	X = 88;
	Y = 40;
	Width = 596;
	Height = 65;
	xAlign = "center";
	yAlign = "center";
	
	Text = "Audio tracks";
	Font = "Verdana";
	fontSize = 48;
	textColor = "255,255,255";
	Bold = 1;
}

buttonAudio
{
	Type = "text";
	Parent = 1;
	
	X = 88;
	
	Width = 596;
	Height = 48;
	xAlign = "center";
	yAlign = "center";
	
	Font = "Verdana";
	textColor = "255,255,255";
	fontSize = 36;
	Bold = 1;
	
	selectMethod = "text";
}

defaultBottomButton
{
	Type = "button";
	Parent = 1;
	
	Y = 492;
	Width = 128;
	
	Font = "Verdana";
	fontSize = 24;
	Bold = 1;
	textColor = "255,255,255";
	
	selectMethod = "text";
}

subTitle
{
	Type = "text";
	
	X = 88;
	Y = 84;
	Width = 596;
	Height = 65;
	xAlign = "center";
	yAlign = "center";
	
	Text = "%titleTitle%";
	Font = "Verdana";
	fontSize = 24;
	textColor = "255,255,255";
	Bold = 1;
}

Audio1
{
	Inherit = "buttonAudio";
	audioID = 1;
	Y = 164;
}

Audio2
{
	Inherit = "buttonAudio";
	audioID = 2;
	Y = 220;
}

Audio3
{
	Inherit = "buttonAudio";
	audioID = 3;
	Y = 276;
}

Audio4
{
	Inherit = "buttonAudio";
	audioID = 4;
	Y = 332;
}

Audio5
{
	Inherit = "buttonAudio";
	audioID = 5;
	Y = 388;
}


buttonResume
{
	Inherit = "defaultBottomButton";
	
	Text = "Resume";
	xAlign = "left";
	X = 146;
}

buttonMainMenu
{
	Inherit = "defaultBottomButton";
	
	Text = "Main Menu";
	xAlign = "right";
	X = 496;
}

}

subtitleMenu
{
backgroundImage = “back.bmp”;
highlightColor = “31,127,223”;
selectColor = “0,95,191”;

Title
{
	Type = "text";
	
	X = 88;
	Y = 40;
	Width = 596;
	Height = 65;
	xAlign = "center";
	yAlign = "center";
	
	Text = "Subtitles";
	Font = "Verdana";
	fontSize = 48;
	textColor = "255,255,255";
	Bold = 1;
}

buttonSub
{
	Type = "text";
	Parent = 1;
	
	X = 88;
	
	Width = 596;
	Height = 48;
	xAlign = "center";
	yAlign = "center";
	
	Font = "Verdana";
	textColor = "255,255,255";
	fontSize = 36;
	Bold = 1;
	
	selectMethod = "text";
}

defaultBottomButton
{
	Type = "button";
	Parent = 1;
	
	Y = 492;
	Width = 128;
	
	Font = "Verdana";
	fontSize = 24;
	Bold = 1;
	textColor = "255,255,255";
	
	selectMethod = "text";
}

subTitle
{
	Type = "text";
	
	X = 88;
	Y = 84;
	Width = 596;
	Height = 65;
	xAlign = "center";
	yAlign = "center";
	
	Text = "%titleTitle%";
	Font = "Verdana";
	fontSize = 24;
	textColor = "255,255,255";
	Bold = 1;
}

disableSubtitle
{
	Inherit = "buttonSub";
	Text = "Disabled";
	Y = 164;
}

Sub1
{
	Inherit = "buttonSub";
	subID = 1;
	Y = 212;
}

Sub2
{
	Inherit = "buttonSub";
	subID = 2;
	Y = 260;
}

Sub3
{
	Inherit = "buttonSub";
	subID = 3;
	Y = 308;
}

Sub4
{
	Inherit = "buttonSub";
	subID = 4;
	Y = 356;
}

Sub5
{
	Inherit = "buttonSub";
	subID = 5;
	Y = 404;
}


buttonResume
{
	Inherit = "defaultBottomButton";
	
	Text = "Resume";
	xAlign = "left";
	X = 146;
}

buttonMainMenu
{
	Inherit = "defaultBottomButton";
	
	Text = "Main Menu";
	xAlign = "right";
	X = 496;
}

}

mainMenu
{
backgroundImage = “back_main.bmp”;
highlightColor = “31,127,223”;
selectColor = “0,95,191”;

Title
{
	Type = "text";
	
	X = 56;
	Y = 136;
	Width = 640;
	Height = 56;
	xAlign = "center";
	yAlign = "center";
	
	Text = "%projectTitle%";
	Font = "Verdana";
	fontSize = 48;
	textColor = "255,255,255";
	Bold = 1;
}

buttonPlay
{
	Type = "button";

	X = 230;
	Y = 304;
	
	selectImage = "button_play.bmp";
	selectMethod = "image";
}

buttonTitleSelect
{
	Type = "button";

	X = 462;
	Y = 338;
	
	selectImage = "button_titles.bmp";
	selectMethod = "image";
}

}

titleMenu
{
backgroundImage = “back.bmp”;
highlightColor = “31,127,223”;
selectColor = “0,95,191”;

defaultThumb
{
	Type = "image";
	Parent = 1;
	Y = 208;
	
	Width = 192;
	Height = 144;
	
	Outline = 4;
	outlineColor = "255,255,255";
	
	selectMethod = "outline";
}

defaultBottomButton
{
	Type = "button";
	Parent = 1;
	
	Y = 444;
	selectMethod = "image";
}

defaultThumbCaption
{
	Type = "text";
	Parent = 1;
	
	Y = 164;
	Width = 192;
	Height = 32;
	
	Font = "Verdana";
	fontSize = 18;
	textColor = "255,255,255";
	xAlign = "center";
	yAlign = "bottom";
	Bold = 1;
}

defaultThumbReflect
{
	Type = "image";
	Parent = 1;
	Y = 360;
	Image = "titlereflect.bmp";
}


Title
{
	Type = "text";
	
	X = 56;
	Y = 64;
	Width = 640;
	Height = 56;
	xAlign = "center";
	yAlign = "center";
	
	Text = "%projectTitle%";
	Font = "Verdana";
	fontSize = 48;
	textColor = "255,255,255";
	Bold = 1;
}


Thumb1
{
	Inherit = "defaultThumb";
	thumbID = 1;
	X = 72;
}

Thumb2
{
	Inherit = "defaultThumb";
	thumbID = 2;
	X = 286;
}

Thumb3
{
	Inherit = "defaultThumb";
	thumbID = 3;
	X = 496;
}

thumbReflect1
{
	Inherit = "defaultThumbReflect";
	thumbID = 1;
	X = 68;
}

thumbReflect2
{
	Inherit = "defaultThumbReflect";
	thumbID = 2;
	X = 282;
}

thumbReflect3
{
	Inherit = "defaultThumbReflect";
	thumbID = 3;
	X = 492;
}
	
thumbCaption1
{
	Inherit = "defaultThumbCaption";
	thumbID = 1;
	X = 72;
}

thumbCaption2
{
	Inherit = "defaultThumbCaption";
	thumbID = 2;
	X = 286;
}

thumbCaption3
{
	Inherit = "defaultThumbCaption";
	thumbID = 3;
	X = 496;
}


buttonMainMenu
{
	Inherit = "defaultBottomButton";
	
	xAlign = "right";
	X = 356;
	
	Image = "button_mainmenu_i.bmp";
	selectImage = "button_mainmenu.bmp";
}

buttonNext
{
	Inherit = "defaultBottomButton";
	
	xAlign = "right";
	X = 646;
	
	Image = "button_next_i.bmp";
	selectImage = "button_next.bmp";
}

buttonPrevious
{
	Inherit = "defaultBottomButton";
	
	xAlign = "right";
	X = 72;
	
	Image = "button_prev_i.bmp";
	selectImage = "button_prev.bmp";
}

}[/code]

Above is the CFG file for one of my themes (I found a few theme packs and etc). All the button images are white, the backgrounds are pink (the same pink that we use in RSPS’s clients, RGB(255,0,255)).

You can see why it’s a little annoying to do each one manually.

The plan is to develop some form of a gui that you can either input the data into (this is the only way I know how atm) or (what I’d really like to do) make it so you can upload all the images to the program, then place them, and etc. Then it’d generate based on that.

Progress:

04/09/2014 - Started development

I’d love it if someone came along and helped with this.

Read full topic
